description:
Billy looks like a military dude to me.
He likes petite "clean" girls, which (I am not sure) but think he means "innocent," based on the conversation we had during the photo session.
Unlike the last couple solos, Billy gets way into it. Giving us lots of energy, breathing and showing off. Truly an exhibitionist!
He plays rugby, hence the banged up knees and a new scar on his right cheek - both only a couple weeks old after a muddy and brutal rugby match.
I love his cumshot, not only because he shoots his load over his shoulder, but because he looks right at the camera as he is gearing up to cum and asks "you" if you're ready for him to cum.
The rest spills into his pubic and tummy hair, which is all completely natural, making a hot sticky mess!
title: Billy - Solo
